title: Toxic Web of Lies
description:
A local businessman is shot and killed by his on-again, off-again girlfriend, who claims she was justified, fending off an attack after years of abuse. In a case where nothing is as it seems, was she telling the truth?

For episode information and photos, please visit https://anatomyofmurder.com/.
author: content@audiochuck.com (audiochuck)
